DOC.brief_summary: Subjects participate motor learn train special bicycle . The experimental group proceed 15 minute physical training bicycle 15 minute rest use motor imaginary . The control group proceed equal except motor imaginary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Complex Motor Learning With Motor Imaginary
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects participate motor learn train special bicycle . The experimental group proceed 15 minute physical training bicycle 15 minute rest use motor imaginary . The control group proceed equal except motor imaginary intervention . Participants control vestibular system previous participation .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 29 year old Asymptomatic Subjects pain In medical treatment Diagnosed disease
